channel.title: flour on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in flour on Recipes

item.title: brain fritters
item.description: Ingredients 1 large brain 200 grams of flour 2 egg yolk milk Directions Prepare a large brain, removing the skin and cooking it in water and salt drain it and cut it into pieces. Put in a bowl the flour, yolks and milk in sufficient quantity to form a soft preparation mix well, add the brains, fry them by tablespoons in hot oil and over moderate heat.

item.title: liver fillets
item.description: Ingredients liver fillets flour salt oil a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter a glass of Marsala wine cooked spinach lard cooked potatoes Directions Cut some liver fillets by touching the telita and nerves and pass them through flour and season with salt. Put in a frying pan half a cup of oil, heat well and brown the encores then add a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter, a glass of Marsala wine, cover and let it boil slowly until the fillets are cooked and the sauce reduced.

item.title: marengo chicken
item.description: Ingredients 1 tender chicken (about 11/2 kilos), broken into 4 pieces 1/2 cup olive oil 3 tablespoons cognac 1 medium onion, chopped 2 tablespoons flour 1 cup dry white wine 1 cube of chicken bouillón 1/4 cup mashed tomatoes 3 sprigs of parsley 1 pinch of dried thyme 1 bay leaf, small 200 grams of fresh mushrooms slices 1 cup toasted croutons Directions Chicken pieces, including giblets, are sprinkled with salt and pepper.

item.title: orange cakes
item.description: Ingredients 300 grams of flour 150 grams of sugar 2 teaspoon baking powder half a teaspoon of salt half a teaspoon of baking soda 100 grams of butter 1 orange Directions Pass through a sifter 300 grams of flour, 150 of sugar, 2 teaspoons filled with baking powder, half salt and a half baking soda. Mix a cup of orange juice with the zest of an orange, 100 grams of barely melted butter, a beaten egg and add it to the other ingredients put in a buttered and floured mold do and cook like the previous ones.

item.title: potato cream soup
item.description: Ingredients 6 tablespoons butter 2 teaspoons salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 3 tablespoons tri flour go 6 cups of hot milk 1 tablespoon grated onion 2 cups mashed potatoes Directions Prepare the bechamel by melting the butter. Add salt, pepper and flour and stir until it forms a pass. Pour the hot milk and onion and move constantly. When it boils add the mashed potatoes. Serve hot.

item.title: potato pie
item.description: Ingredients 2 pounds of potatoes 1 teaspoon salt 2 beaten eggs 4 tablespoons flour 2 cups minced meat filling Directions Boil and mash the potatoes. Add salt, eggs, and flour. Divide into two portions. Put a part in a greased mold so that it shakes the entire mold. Pour the ground beef and spread it and rub with the rest of the potatoes. Cook in a moderate oven at 350 degrees F for 30 or 40 minutes.

item.title: pumpkin purée
item.description: Ingredients 6 cups broth 1/2 pound split pumpkin in pieces 2 tablespoons flour 1 tablespoon mantequi at Directions Boil the pumpkin in the broth. Strain and mash the pumpkin, mix the flour with a little cold broth, add the butter and put on the fire, stirring constantly and add the rest of the broth. Season to taste and serve warm.

item.title: roast chicken
item.description: Ingredients 1 3 lbs. chicken cut into pieces wheat flour, salt and pepper frying fat 1 1/2 cups sifted flour 1 1/2 teaspoon powder baking 1 teaspoon salt 4 eggs 1 1/2 cup milk 3 tablespoons butter or fortified margarine, melted black pepper Directions Put the chicken pieces in a cartridge, with flour, salt and pepper, and shake the cartridge so that the pieces are well covered with flour. In a large skillet, cover the chicken on both sides, in hot oil.

item.title: sweet potato pudding
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound sweet potato boiled and mashed 1/2 cup sugar 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon 1/4 cup wheat flour 1/4 cup milk 2 tablespoons butter melted 2 beaten eggs 1/4 teaspoon salt Directions Mix the ingredients in the order they appear, beat to join them well. Pour into an engrated mold and cook in a moderate heat oven for 20 to 30 minutes.
